attributes.action: Ensure guaranteed NHS registration with a local dentist.
attributes.background: Currently people are finding it almost impossible to register as NHS patients with local dentist surgeries.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the availability of dental services under the NHS, however it's not clear what you want the Government to do in order to 'guarantee' that all NHS patients can register with a dentist. In any case, it is for individual surgeries to determine whether they have capacity to accept the registration of new NHS patients, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Increase NHS dental care funding to improve availability for child and adults': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601744

'Increase funding to ensure all children in England have access to an NHS dentist': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598958
